content:
Can you help me find the scientific names of different animals? I have a list of animals that I need to identify:
- lion
- giraffe
- elephant
- zebra
- hippopotamus
I would appreciate it if you could create an HTML page that displays the scientific names for each of these animals. Please include the necessary HTML code and any resources needed to complete this task. Thank you!

Sure, I can help you with that! Below is an HTML page that displays the common names of the animals you listed along with their scientific names. ```html Animal Scientific Names

Scientific Names of Animals

Common Name Scientific Name
Lion Panthera leo
Giraffe Giraffa camelopardalis
Elephant Loxodonta africana (African Elephant) or Elephas maximus (Asian Elephant)
Zebra Equus quagga (Plains Zebra), Equus zebra (Mountain Zebra), or Equus grevyi (Grévy's Zebra)
Hippopotamus Hippopotamus amphibius
``` ### Instructions: 1. Copy the above HTML code into a text editor. 2. Save the file with a `.html` extension, for example, `animal_scientific_names.html`. 3. Open this file in a web browser to view the table of animals and their scientific names. Feel free to modify the content or style as needed!
